name: SEER Regional Nodes
title: SEER Regional Nodes
notes:
**Note 1:** Extraosseous plasmacytomas (9734), especially those in the respiratory tract, may metastasize to regional lymph nodes. Use code 100 for SEER Regional Nodes to document regional lymph node metastasis. 

**Note 2:** Use code 987, not applicable, for the following histologies: Plasmacytoma, NOS (9731) and multiple myeloma (9732).
rows:
For extraosseous plasmacytomas (9734) only:
    No regional lymph node involvement

For extraosseous plasmacytomas (9734) only:
    Regional lymph node metastasis

Not applicable:  Use for codes 9731(Plasmacytoma, NOS) and 9732 (multiple myeloma)
Not extraosseous plasmacytoma (9734)

Unknown; regional lymph nodes not stated
Regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed
Not documented in patient record
